name: Snap! (Natbug)
description:
Project 6/10 for #GameAWeek2018

The theme for this week was camerawork. Snap! is a semi spooky game about selfies.

Instructions:
You can either download it for Windows or play it in browser, but make sure the Unity Web Player is fullscreen before you start.

Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around
